5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Abdur-Rahman bin Humaid Az-Zuhri said:“I asked Sa’ib bin Yazid: ‘What have you heard about staying in Makkah?’ He said: ‘I heard ‘Ala’ bin Hadrami say: “The Prophet (ﷺ) said: ‘Three (days) for the Muhajir after departing (from Mina).’”* * The meaning of it is: being hished from the rites (of Hajj)

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ يَقْصُرُ الصَّلاَةَ الْمُسَافِرُ إِذَا أَقَامَ بِبَلْدَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: For how long may a traveler shorten his Prayer if he stays in a town?
